DOC.brief_summary: Pregabalin will decrease the total amount of opioid required in patients undergoing total abdominal hysterectomy. In addition, pregabalin will decrease the incidence of opioid-related side effects in patients undergoing total abdominal hysterectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Effect of Pregabalin in Patients Undergoing Total Abdominal Hysterectomy
